languages.text: "Я часто сталкиваюсь с подобной реакцией. Пока Лорд-капитан и {mf|его|ее} подданные не мешают моей работе и не вызывают моего профессионального интереса, я не буду вмешиваться в дела Вольного Торговца и лишний раз отвлекать тебя своей компанией".

traits.locale_text: "Я часто сталкиваюсь с подобной реакцией. Пока Лорд-капитан и {mf|его|ее} подданные не мешают моей работе и не вызывают моего профессионального интереса, я не буду вмешиваться в дела Вольного Торговца и лишний раз отвлекать тебя своей компанией".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "I often encounter such reactions. As long as the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} subjects do not interfere with my work or attract my professional interest, I will not interfere in the Rogue Trader's affairs or distract you with my presence more than is strictly necessary."
languages.original_text: "Я часто сталкиваюсь с подобной реакцией. Пока Лорд-капитан и {mf|его|ее} подданные не мешают моей работе и не вызывают моего профессионального интереса, я не буду вмешиваться в дела Вольного Торговца и лишний раз отвлекать тебя своей компанией".

traits.locale_text: "I often run into such a reaction. As long as Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} subjects do not interfere with my work or attract my professional interest, I will not interfere in the Rogue Trader's affairs of distract you with my company more than is strictly necessary."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I often run into such a reaction. As long as Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} subjects do not interfere with my work or attract my professional interest, I will not interfere in the Rogue Trader's affairs of distract you with my company more than is strictly necessary."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I often encounter such reactions. As long as the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} subjects do not interfere with my work or attract my professional interest, I will not interfere in the Rogue Trader's affairs or distract you with my presence more than is strictly necessary."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I often encounter such reactions. As long as the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} subjects do not interfere with my work or attract my professional interest, I will not interfere in the Rogue Trader's affairs or distract you with my presence more than is strictly necessary."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I often encounter such reactions. As long as the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} subjects do not interfere with my work or attract my professional interest, I will not interfere in the Rogue Trader's affairs or distract you with my presence more than is strictly necessary."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Es una reacción común. Mientras {mf|el|la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} y sus súbditos no interfieran en mi trabajo ni despierten mi interés personal, no tengo intención de entrometerme en los asuntos de {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente ni de distraerle más de lo necesario».
languages.original_text: "I often encounter such reactions. As long as the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} subjects do not interfere with my work or attract my professional interest, I will not interfere in the Rogue Trader's affairs or distract you with my presence more than is strictly necessary."

traits.locale_text: «Es una reacción común. Mientras {mf|el|la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} y sus súbditos no interfieran en mi trabajo ni despierten mi interés personal, no tengo intención de entrometerme en los asuntos de {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente ni de distraerle más de lo necesario».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我经常会遇到这样的反应。只要舰长大人与{mf|他|她}的臣民不要干扰我的工作，不要引起我的职业兴趣，我就不会干涉行商浪人的事务，也不会过多地让你分心。”
languages.original_text: "I often encounter such reactions. As long as the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} subjects do not interfere with my work or attract my professional interest, I will not interfere in the Rogue Trader's affairs or distract you with my presence more than is strictly necessary."

traits.locale_text: “我经常会遇到这样的反应。只要舰长大人与{mf|他|她}的臣民不要干扰我的工作，不要引起我的职业兴趣，我就不会干涉行商浪人的事务，也不会过多地让你分心。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「そういう反応は慣れっこだね。ロード・キャプテンとその家臣がこちらの仕事に干渉したり、こちらが職業上気になる点がない限り、こちらは自由開拓者の仕事に干渉したり、俺がいることで必要以上に目障りになる行動を取ったりはしない」
languages.original_text: "I often encounter such reactions. As long as the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} subjects do not interfere with my work or attract my professional interest, I will not interfere in the Rogue Trader's affairs or distract you with my presence more than is strictly necessary."

traits.locale_text: 「そういう反応は慣れっこだね。ロード・キャプテンとその家臣がこちらの仕事に干渉したり、こちらが職業上気になる点がない限り、こちらは自由開拓者の仕事に干渉したり、俺がいることで必要以上に目障りになる行動を取ったりはしない」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Derartige Reaktionen sind mir nicht fremd. Solange der Lord Captain und {mf|seine|ihre} Getreuen nicht meine Arbei stören oder mein berufliches Interesse wecken, werde ich mich nicht in die Belange des Freihändlers einmischen oder euch mehr als unbeding nötig mit meiner Gegenwart behelligen."
languages.original_text: "I often encounter such reactions. As long as the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} subjects do not interfere with my work or attract my professional interest, I will not interfere in the Rogue Trader's affairs or distract you with my presence more than is strictly necessary."

traits.locale_text: "Derartige Reaktionen sind mir nicht fremd. Solange der Lord Captain und {mf|seine|ihre} Getreuen nicht meine Arbei stören oder mein berufliches Interesse wecken, werde ich mich nicht in die Belange des Freihändlers einmischen oder euch mehr als unbeding nötig mit meiner Gegenwart behelligen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Je suscite souvent ce genre de réaction. Tant que vous et vos sujets évitez de nuire à mon travail ou d'éveiller mon intérêt professionnel, je tâcherai de ne pas vous distraire plus que nécessaire et vous pourrez vaquer librement à vos occupations de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "I often encounter such reactions. As long as the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} subjects do not interfere with my work or attract my professional interest, I will not interfere in the Rogue Trader's affairs or distract you with my presence more than is strictly necessary."

traits.locale_text: « Je suscite souvent ce genre de réaction. Tant que vous et vos sujets évitez de nuire à mon travail ou d'éveiller mon intérêt professionnel, je tâcherai de ne pas vous distraire plus que nécessaire et vous pourrez vaquer librement à vos occupations de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Bu tip tepkilerle sık karşılaşırım. Lord Kaptan ve maiyeti işime mani olmazsa, kişisel olarak ilgilenmemi gerektirecek bir şey yapmazsa Hür Tacir'in işine müdahil olmayacak, gerekli durumlar haricinde seni varlığımla rahatsız etmeyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "I often encounter such reactions. As long as the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} subjects do not interfere with my work or attract my professional interest, I will not interfere in the Rogue Trader's affairs or distract you with my presence more than is strictly necessary."

traits.locale_text: "Bu tip reaksiyonlarla sık karşılaşırım. Lord Kaptan ve maiyeti işime mani olmazsa veya kişisel olarak ilgilenmemi gerektirecek bir şey yapmazsa, Hür Tacir'in işine müdâhil olmayacağım veya kesinlikle gerektiği durumlar haricinde seni varlığımla rahatsız etmeyeceğim."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
